pageContext.claim: “My presidential budget was the first in history to include a nationwide program for paid family leave.”
pageContext.analysis: Obama was a big advocate of parental leave, expanding it in the federal government through executive action, and his budget included funds to expand state programs. Trump appears to distinguish his proposal from Obama's efforts by citing a "nationwide program." But while it was in the budget, Trump and his administration have done little to push for the idea in Congress.
